content:
TITLE: Converting Pixel Point to Geographic Coordinate in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the getCoordinateFromView method to convert a pixel point on the map view to a geographic coordinate. This is useful for interpreting user touch events or positioning elements based on screen coordinates. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/map-view.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` const coordinate = await mapViewRef.current?.getCoordinateFromView([100, 100]); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Complete React Component Example with Custom Headers DESCRIPTION: A working example of a React component that adds custom HTTP headers. It demonstrates adding a header within a useEffect hook (which runs once on component mount) and adding another header directly in the component function. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/guides/custom-http-headers.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` function App() { useEffect(() => { addCustomHeader("Authorization", "{auth header}"); }, []); addCustomHeader("X-Some-Header", "my-value"); return ; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering MapView Component in React Native DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to import and use the MapView component from @maplibre/maplibre-react-native in a React Native application. It creates a basic map that fills the entire screen. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/setup/getting-started.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` import React from "react"; import { MapView } from "@maplibre/maplibre-react-native"; function App() { return ; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Taking Map Snapshots with SnapshotManager in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Examples of using the SnapshotManager.takeSnap method to generate static map images. Demonstrates three different approaches: creating a temp file with specified view parameters, creating a base64 PNG without the Mapbox logo, and creating a snapshot using bounds coordinates. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/snapshot-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` // creates a temp file png of base map const uri = await SnapshotManager.takeSnap({ centerCoordinate: [-74.12641, 40.797968], width: width, height: height, zoomLevel: 12, pitch: 30, heading: 20, styleURL: StyleURL.Default, writeToDisk: true, // Create a temporary file }); // creates base64 png of base map without logo const uri = await SnapshotManager.takeSnap({ centerCoordinate: [-74.12641, 40.797968], width: width, height: height, zoomLevel: 12, pitch: 30, heading: 20, styleURL: StyleURL.Default, withLogo: false, // Disable Mapbox logo (Android only) }); // creates snapshot with bounds const uri = await SnapshotManager.takeSnap({ bounds: [ [-74.12641, 40.797968], [-74.143727, 40.772177], ], width: width, height: height, styleURL: StyleURL.Default, }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Rendered Features at Point in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This method queries map features at a specific point with optional filtering by expression and layer IDs. It returns an array of rendered map features that intersect with the given point. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/map-view.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` this._map.queryRenderedFeaturesAtPoint( [30, 40], ["==", "type", "Point"], ["id1", "id2"], ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using fitBounds Camera Control in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates different ways to use fitBounds method to adjust camera view with optional padding and animation duration. Shows variations of padding configuration including single value and array-based padding. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/camera.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` cameraRef.current?.fitBounds([lng, lat], [lng, lat]); cameraRef.current?.fitBounds([lng, lat], [lng, lat], 20, 1000); // padding for all sides cameraRef.current?.fitBounds( [lng, lat], [lng, lat], [verticalPadding, horizontalPadding], 1000, ); cameraRef.current?.fitBounds( [lng, lat], [lng, lat], [top, right, bottom, left], 1000, ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Rendered Features in Rectangle in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This method returns an array of rendered map features that intersect with a given rectangle, with optional filtering by expression and layer IDs. The bbox parameter defines the rectangle's coordinates. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/map-view.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` this._map.queryRenderedFeaturesInRect( [30, 40, 20, 10], ["==", "type", "Point"], ["id1", "id2"], ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Features from VectorSource in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to call the features() method on a VectorSource instance to retrieve features from specific layers. This method returns all features that match the query parameters from currently-loaded vector tiles and GeoJSON source tiles. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/vector-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` vectorSource.features(["id1", "id2"]); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Getting Cluster Children in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to retrieve the child features of a cluster at the next zoom level. It returns a FeatureCollection containing the children of the specified cluster. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/shape-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` const collection = await shapeSource.getClusterChildren(clusterId); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Connected State in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Examples of using setConnected() to control the connectivity state. Shows how to enable localhost connections when device is offline and how to block all style/source requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/mlrn-module.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` setConnected(true); ``` LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` setConnected(false); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Converting Geographic Coordinate to Pixel Point in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the getPointInView method to convert a geographic coordinate to a pixel point on the map view. This method is useful for positioning overlays or determining screen positions of map features. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/map-view.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` const pointInView = await mapViewRef.current?.getPointInView([ -37.81707, 144.949901, ]); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Camera Component Method for Fitting Map Bounds in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The fitBounds() method transitions the map camera to fit the specified northeast and southwest boundaries. It accepts optional padding and animation duration parameters to customize the transition effect. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/camera.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### `fitBounds(ne, sw, [padding], [animationDuration])` Map camera transitions to fit provided bounds ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Getting Cluster Expansion Zoom Level in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This code retrieves the zoom level needed to expand a cluster. It takes a cluster feature as input and returns a Promise that resolves to the zoom level where the cluster expands. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/shape-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` const zoom = await shapeSource.getClusterExpansionZoom(clusterId); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Features from a ShapeSource in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to retrieve all features from a ShapeSource that match optional query parameters. The features method returns data regardless of whether the feature is currently rendered on the map. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/shape-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` shapeSource.features(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using SymbolLayer Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The SymbolLayer component renders icon and text labels at points or along lines on the map. It accepts customizable style attributes and an optional sourceID property. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JSX CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an Offline Map Pack with MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to create and register an offline map pack that downloads the resources needed for offline use in a specified region with zoom levels. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` const progressListener = (offlineRegion, status) => console.log(offlineRegion, status); const errorListener = (offlineRegion, err) => console.log(offlineRegion, err); await OfflineManager.createPack( { name: "offlinePack", styleURL: "https://demotiles.maplibre.org/tiles/tiles.json", minZoom: 14, maxZoom: 20, bounds: [ [neLng, neLat], [swLng, swLat], ], }, progressListener, errorListener, ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving All Offline Packs in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to get all current offline packs stored in the database. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` const offlinePacks = await OfflineManager.getPacks(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Unsubscribing from Offline Pack Events in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to unsubscribe listeners associated with an offline pack. Recommended to call this in componentWillUnmount. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` OfflineManager.unsubscribe("packName"); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Subscribing to Offline Pack Events in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to subscribe to download status and error events for a specific offline pack. Note that createPack calls this internally if listeners are provided. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` const progressListener = (offlinePack, status) => console.log(offlinePack, status); const errorListener = (offlinePack, err) => console.log(offlinePack, err); OfflineManager.subscribe("packName", progressListener, errorListener); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using ShapeSource Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use the ShapeSource component to supply vector shapes to a map. It demonstrates that the shape can be provided either as a URL or as a GeoJSON object. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/shape-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Source Visibility in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This method sets the visibility of all layers referencing a specified source ID and/or source layer ID. It's useful for showing or hiding groups of related layers at once. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/map-view.md#2025-04-19_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` await this._map.setSourceVisibility(false, "composite", "building"); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Resetting the Database in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to delete the existing database (including ambient cache and offline packs) and reinitialize it. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` await OfflineManager.resetDatabase(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using flyTo Camera Control in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use flyTo method to animate camera movement to new coordinates with optional animation duration. The camera will fly to the specified coordinates using a smooth animation. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/camera.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` cameraRef.current?.flyTo([lng, lat]); cameraRef.current?.flyTo([lng, lat], 12000); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Text Translation Anchor in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Controls the frame of reference for textTranslate. It can be set to 'map' or 'viewport'. It requires both textField and textTranslate properties and supports zoom as an expression parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_57 LANGUAGE: markup CODE: ```
Type
enum
Default Value
map
Supported Values
  • map: The text is translated relative to the map.
  • viewport: The text is translated relative to the viewport.
Requires
textField, textTranslate
Expression Parameters
zoom
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using the Annotation Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This is the API documentation for the Annotation component that shows all available props and methods. The component allows adding annotations to maps with options for coordinates, styling, animation, and custom icons. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/annotation.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PointAnnotation Component Type Definition DESCRIPTION: TypeScript interface showing the available props for the PointAnnotation component. This component renders a single point annotation on a map with support for custom styling, dragging, and interaction. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/point-annotation.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` interface PointAnnotationProps { id: string; title?: string; snippet?: string; selected?: boolean; draggable?: boolean; coordinate: [number, number]; anchor?: { x: number; y: number; }; children: ReactElement | [ReactElement, ReactElement]; style?: ViewProps["style"]; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Clearing the Ambient Cache in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to erase resources from the ambient cache to decrease the amount of space that map resources take up on the device. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` await OfflineManager.clearAmbientCache(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: RasterSource Component Usage Example (JSX/TSX) DESCRIPTION: Example declaration of the RasterSource component showing the available props and their types. This component is used to configure raster tile sources in MapLibre React Native maps. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/raster-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: ImageSource Component Props Interface DESCRIPTION: Defines the required and optional properties for the ImageSource component including id, url, coordinates and children. The component is used to display georeferenced raster images that scale and rotate with map interactions. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/image-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` interface ImageSourceProps { id: string; // Required unique identifier url?: number | string; // Source image URL coordinates?: tuple; // Image corner coordinates children?: ReactNode; // Child components } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Cluster Leaves in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: This method retrieves a FeatureCollection from a cluster with pagination support. It requires a cluster feature, a limit for the number of points to return, and an offset for pagination. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/sources/shape-source.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` const collection = await shapeSource.getClusterLeaves(clusterId, limit, offset); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting iconTextFit Property in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Controls how the icon is scaled to fit around associated text. Can be set to none, width, height, or both. Requires both iconImage and textField properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` enum ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using moveTo Camera Control in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates moveTo method usage for moving camera to new coordinates while maintaining zoom level. Shows both immediate movement and eased animation with duration. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/camera.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` cameraRef.current?.moveTo([lng, lat], 200); // eases camera to new location based on duration cameraRef.current?.moveTo([lng, lat]); // snaps camera to new location without any easing ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Log Callback in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Method to customize logging behavior by providing a callback function. The callback receives a log object containing message, level, and tag properties. Returns falsy value to fallback to default logging. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/logger.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` setLogCallback(LogCallback: (logObject: { message: String, level: LogLevel, tag: String }) => any) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting iconImage Property in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Specifies the name of image in sprite to use for drawing an image background. This is a required property for most icon-related properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` resolvedImage ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using CircleLayer Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use the CircleLayer component in MapLibre React Native applications for rendering circle elements on maps. The CircleLayer renders one or more filled circles and supports various customizable style attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/circle-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Table of MapLibre React Native Annotation Features DESCRIPTION: Markdown table comparing features and implementations of different annotation types in MapLibre React Native, including support for images, React Native views, interactions, z-index control, clustering, and style expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/guides/annotations.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Feature | `CircleLayer` | `SymbolLayer` | `PointAnnotation` | `MarkerView` | | ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Can use Images | ✗ | ✓ | ✗ | ✗ | | `children` RN View | ✗ | iOS: Static | iOS: Interactive
Android: Static | Interactive | | Interactions | Click | Click | iOS: Complete
Android: Click, drag, callout | Only `children` RN View is interactive | | Control z-index | ✓ | ✓ | iOS: Always on top
Android: Not available | Always on top | | Clustering | ✓ | ✓ | ✗ | ✗ | | Style with Expressions | ✓ | ✓ | ✗ | ✗ | | Android Implementation | [`CircleLayer`](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-native/android/api/-map-libre%20-native%20-android/org.maplibre.android.style.layers/-circle-layer/index.html) | [`SymbolLayer`](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-native/android/api/-map-libre%20-native%20-android/org.maplibre.android.style.layers/-symbol-layer/index.html) | [`annotation.Symbol`](https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-plugins-android/blob/main/plugin-annotation/src/main/java/org/maplibre/android/plugins/annotation/Symbol.java) | [`annotation.MarkerView`](https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-plugins-android/blob/main/plugin-markerview/src/main/java/org/maplibre/android/plugins/markerview/MarkerView.java) | | iOS Implementation | [`MLNCircleStyleLayer`](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-native/ios/latest/documentation/maplibre/mlncirclestylelayer/) | [`MLNSymbolStyleLayer`](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-native/ios/latest/documentation/maplibre/mlnsymbolstylelayer/) | [`MLNAnnotationView`](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-native/ios/latest/documentation/maplibre/mlnannotationview/) | [`MLNAnnotationView`](https://maplibre.org/maplibre-native/ios/latest/documentation/maplibre/mlnannotationview/) | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Line Offset Configuration DESCRIPTION: Controls the line's offset position relative to its direction. For linear features, positive values offset right and negative left. For polygons, positive values create insets, negative create outsets. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/line-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` { lineOffset: number; // Default: 0 lineOffsetTransition: { duration: number, delay: number }; // Default: { duration: 300, delay: 0 } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Visible Bounds of MapLibre React Native Map DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to get the coordinate bounds (northeast and southwest corners) of the currently visible map area using the getVisibleBounds method. This is useful for determining the extent of the map that the user can see. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/map-view.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` const visibleBounds = await this._map.getVisibleBounds(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating MapView Style Props in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The styleURL and styleJSON props have been unified into a single mapStyle prop for controlling the MapView style. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/setup/migrations/v10.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Log Level in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Method to configure the logging verbosity level. Accepts a string parameter that can be 'error', 'warning', 'info', 'debug', or 'verbose'. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/logger.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` setLogLevel(LogLevel: "error" | "warning" | "info" | "debug" | "verbose") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using BackgroundLayer Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Example of the BackgroundLayer component with its available props. This component allows customizing the map background with style attributes and optionally specifying a sourceID. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/background-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting textField Property in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Specifies the value to use for a text label. If a plain string is provided, it will be treated as formatted text with default/inherited formatting options. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` formatted ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting iconOffset Property in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Specifies the offset distance of icon from its anchor. Positive values move right and down, negative values move left and up. Each component is multiplied by iconSize for final pixel offset. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` number[] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Invalidating an Offline Pack in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to invalidate a specified offline pack to check if local tiles match those from the server and update them if needed, which is more efficient than re-downloading the entire pack. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` await OfflineManager.invalidatePack("packName"); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using FillLayer Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Example usage of the FillLayer component to render filled polygons on a map. The component accepts style properties and a sourceID to customize the appearance and data source of the fill layer. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/fill-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Text Anchor in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Defines which part of the text is placed closest to the anchor. Default is center. Requires textField and is disabled by textVariableAnchor. Supports camera style functions. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` center ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using zoomTo Camera Control in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use zoomTo method to change the camera zoom level with optional animation duration. The method allows smooth transitions between zoom levels. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/camera.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` cameraRef.current?.zoomTo(16); cameraRef.current?.zoomTo(16, 100); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: FillExtrusionLayer Component Usage Example DESCRIPTION: Basic structure of the FillExtrusionLayer component. This component renders one or more 3D extruded polygons on the map with customizable style attributes and optional source ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/fill-extrusion-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Text Size in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Font size property measured in pixels. The minimum allowed value is 0 and the default is 16. Requires textField to be set and supports zoom and feature as expression parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 16 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using MarkerView Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Example usage of the MarkerView component that places an interactive React Native marker on a map. The component is based on the MarkerView plugin on Android and PointAnnotation on iOS. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/marker-view.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # `` MarkerView allows you to place a interactive react native marker to the map.

If you have static view consider using PointAnnotation or SymbolLayer they'll offer much better performance
.
This is based on [MakerView plugin](https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-plugins-android/tree/main/plugin-markerview) on Android
and PointAnnotation on iOS. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: LineLayer Component Basic Usage DESCRIPTION: Example structure showing the usage of LineLayer component with its two main props - style and sourceID. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/line-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using HeatmapLayer JSX Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Basic usage example of the HeatmapLayer component, which renders one or more filled circles on the map as a heatmap visualization. The component accepts style attributes and sourceID as props. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/setup/library-customizations.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import type { MapLibrePluginProps } from "@maplibre/maplibre-react-native"; export default ({ config }: ConfigContext): ExpoConfig => ({ ...config, plugins: [ [ "@maplibre/maplibre-react-native", { android: { nativeVersion: "x.x.x", }, ios: { nativeVersion: "x.x.x", }, } as MapLibrePluginProps, ], ], }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Progress Event Throttle in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to set the period (in milliseconds) at which download status events will be sent over the React Native bridge. Default is 500ms. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` OfflineManager.setProgressEventThrottle(500); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting textPitchAlignment Property in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Controls the orientation of text when map is pitched. Can be set to map, viewport, or auto (matching text-rotation-alignment). Requires the textField property. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` enum ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting an Offline Pack in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to unregister an offline pack and free resources that are no longer required by any remaining packs. Default value is 0. Useful with textVariableAnchor and requires textField to be set. The style prop is of type RasterLayerStyle and is used for customizing the layer's appearance. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/raster-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` # `` ## Props | Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description | | ---------- | :-------------------: | :--------------------------------------: | :------: | ----------------------------- | | `style` | `RasterLayerStyle` | `none` | `false` | Customizable style attributes | | `sourceID` | `FIX ME UNKNOWN TYPE` | `MLRNModule.StyleSource.DefaultSourceID` | `false` | FIX ME NO DESCRIPTION | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing Custom Headers in iOS AppDelegate DESCRIPTION: Example of how to initialize custom HTTP headers in iOS by including the header file, initializing headers to enable method swizzling, and optionally adding global headers. This should be implemented in the AppDelegate.m file's application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions: method. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/guides/custom-http-headers.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: objectivec CODE: ``` // (1) Include the header file #import "MLRNCustomHeaders.h" @implementation AppDelegate - (BOOL)application:(UIApplication *)application didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:(NSDictionary *)launchOptions { RCTBridge *bridge = [[RCTBridge alloc] initWithDelegate:self launchOptions:launchOptions]; RCTRootView *rootView = [[RCTRootView alloc] initWithBridge:bridge moduleName:@"SampleApp" initialProperties:nil]; // (2) Init headers, add swizzle method [[MLRNCustomHeaders sharedInstance] initHeaders]; // (3*) Optionally you can add some global headers here [[MLRNCustomHeaders sharedInstance] addHeader:@"IP" forHeaderName:@"X-For-Real"]; ... return YES; } ... @end ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Text Maximum Width in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Maximum line width for text wrapping, measured in ems. Default value is 10 with a minimum of 0. Requires textField and supports camera style functions with zoom and feature parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 10 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing a Custom HTTP Header in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Example of removing a previously added custom HTTP header using the removeCustomHeader function in TypeScript. This function takes the header name to be removed as a parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/guides/custom-http-headers.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` removeCustomHeader("Authorization"); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using setCamera Advanced Configuration in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates advanced camera control using setCamera method with configuration object. Shows both single update and multiple sequential camera updates using stops array. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/camera.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` cameraRef.current?.setCamera({ centerCoordinate: [lng, lat], zoomLevel: 16, animationDuration: 2000, }); cameraRef.current?.setCamera({ stops: [ { pitch: 45, animationDuration: 200 }, { heading: 180, animationDuration: 300 }, ], }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Text Keep Upright in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Boolean property that determines if text may be flipped vertically to prevent upside-down rendering. Default is true. Requires textField and supports zoom as an expression parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Line Pattern Configuration DESCRIPTION: Specifies sprite image for drawing patterned lines. Image width must be power of 2 for seamless patterns. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/line-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` { linePattern: resolvedImage; linePatternTransition: { duration: number, delay: number }; // Default: { duration: 300, delay: 0 } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Invalidating the Ambient Cache in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to force revalidation of tiles in the ambient cache and download fresh versions from the server, which is the recommended method for clearing the cache. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` await OfflineManager.invalidateAmbientCache(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Raster Opacity for RasterLayer in React Native DESCRIPTION: This code snippet details the 'rasterOpacity' style property for the RasterLayer component. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/callout.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description | | ---------------- | :---------: | :-----: | :------: | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | `title` | `string` | `none` | `false` | String that get's displayed in the default callout. | | `style` | `ViewStyle` | `none` | `false` | Style property for the Animated.View wrapper, apply animations to this | | `containerStyle` | `ViewStyle` | `none` | `false` | Style property for the native MLRNCallout container, set at your own risk. | | `contentStyle` | `ViewStyle` | `none` | `false` | Style property for the content bubble. | | `tipStyle` | `ViewStyle` | `none` | `false` | Style property for the triangle tip under the content. | | `textStyle` | `ViewStyle` | `none` | `false` | Style property for the title in the content bubble. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Light Transition Properties DESCRIPTION: Default transition configuration for light property changes, specifying duration and delay in milliseconds. See also #anchor. | | `anchor` | `shape` | `{ x: 0.5, y: 0.5 }` | `false` | Specifies the anchor being set on a particular point of the annotation.
The anchor point is specified in the continuous space [0.0, 1.0] x [0.0, 1.0],
where (0, 0) is the top-left corner of the image, and (1, 1) is the bottom-right corner.
Note this is only for custom annotations not the default pin view.
Defaults to the center of the view. | | ` x` | `number` | `none` | `true` | `x` of anchor | | ` y` | `number` | `none` | `true` | `y` of anchor | | `allowOverlap` | `boolean` | `false` | `false` | FIX ME NO DESCRIPTION | | `isSelected` | `boolean` | `false` | `false` | FIX ME NO DESCRIPTION | | `children` | `ReactElement` | `none` | `true` | Expects one child - can be container with multiple elements | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking LocationManager Running State for UserLocation Component DESCRIPTION: Method to determine if the LocationManager should be running based on the component's current configuration. To maintain previous behavior, animationDuration and animationMode props should be added. Takes a style prop of type LightLayerStyle which is optional. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/light.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` interface LightProps { style?: LightLayerStyle; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PointAnnotation Refresh Method DESCRIPTION: Method declaration for refreshing the point annotation's rendered image on Android. This is particularly useful when the annotation's appearance needs to be updated after loading images or making visual changes. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/general/point-annotation.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` interface PointAnnotation { refresh(): void; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Text Transformation in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Specifies how to capitalize text (similar to CSS textTransform). Options are none, uppercase, or lowercase. Default is none. Requires textField and supports zoom and feature parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` none ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Text Halo Width Transition in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Defines the transition affecting changes to the textHaloWidth property. It specifies the duration and delay of the transition in milliseconds. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_52 LANGUAGE: markup CODE: ```
Type
{ duration, delay }
Units
milliseconds
Default Value
{ duration: 300, delay: 0 }
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Visibility Style for RasterLayer in React Native DESCRIPTION: This snippet describes the 'visibility' style property for the RasterLayer component. It controls whether the layer is displayed and can be set to 'visible' or 'none'. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/raster-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### `visibility` Whether this layer is displayed.
Type
enum
Default Value
visible
Supported Values
  • visible: The layer is shown.
  • none: The layer is not shown.
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Text Ignore Placement Property Definition in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The textIgnorePlacement property specifies whether other symbols can be visible even if they collide with the text. Default is false. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` false ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Text Color Transition Property Definition in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The textColorTransition property defines animation duration and delay for changes to text color. Default duration is 300ms with no delay. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_48 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` { duration: 300, delay: 0 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting iconSize Property in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Scales the original size of the icon by the provided factor. The new pixel size of the image will be the original pixel size multiplied by this value. Requires iconImage property. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` number ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining circleStrokeOpacityTransition in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The circleStrokeOpacityTransition property is an object that specifies the duration and delay for transitions affecting the circleStrokeOpacity. It uses milliseconds as units and has a default duration of 300ms with no delay. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/circle-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` { duration: 300, delay: 0 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Text Opacity Transition Property Definition in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The textOpacityTransition property defines animation duration and delay for changes to text opacity. Default duration is 300ms with no delay. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_46 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` { duration: 300, delay: 0 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sideloading Offline Regions in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Shows how to merge offline regions from an external database file. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/modules/offline-manager.md#2025-04-19_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` await OfflineManager.mergeOfflineRegions(path); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: LineLayer Style Interface DESCRIPTION: Interface showing the structure of transition properties used in line styling. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/line-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` interface LineLayerTransition { duration: number; // milliseconds delay: number; // milliseconds } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing setAccessToken in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The setAccessToken(null) call is now obsolete. Vendor-specific access tokens should be set via style or tile URLs instead. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/setup/migrations/v10.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` - setAccessToken(null) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating and Installing Package Tarball DESCRIPTION: Commands for creating a tarball package and installing it in another project SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn pack --out %s-%v.tgz yarn add ./@maplibre-maplibre-react-native-X.X.X.tgz ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Icon Color Property Definition in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The iconColor property sets the color of SDF icons. Default value is black (#000000). SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` #000000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Light Position Default Value DESCRIPTION: Default position value for the light source specified as [r, a, p] coordinates where r is radial distance, a is azimuthal angle, and p is polar angle. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/light.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` [1.15, 210, 30] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Deprecated Camera Props in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The allowUpdates and triggerKey props have been removed from the Camera component. Use stable props or the imperative setCamera method instead. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/setup/migrations/v10.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting iconAnchor Property in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: Determines which part of the icon is placed closest to the anchor point. Options include center, left, right, top, bottom, and corner positions. Requires the iconImage property. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` enum ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Icon Halo Blur Property Definition in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The iconHaloBlur property controls how much the halo fades out toward the outside. Values are in pixels with a minimum of 0. SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/maplibre-react-native/blob/main/docs/content/components/layers/symbol-layer.md#2025-04-19_snippet_40 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` 0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Style Component in MapLibre React Native DESCRIPTION: The Style component has been removed. Style objects should now be passed directly to the MapView's mapStyle prop.
